properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.bundle
properties.description: Name of a configured SSL bundle.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.certificate
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded SSL certificate file.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.certificate-private-key
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded private key file for the SSL certificate.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.ciphers
properties.description: Supported SSL ciphers.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.client-auth
properties.description: Client authentication mode. Requires a trust store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL support.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.enabled-protocols
properties.description: Enabled SSL protocols.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-alias
properties.description: Alias that identifies the key in the key store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-password
properties.description: Password used to access the key in the key store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-store
properties.description: Path to the key store that holds the SSL certificate (typically a jks file).

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-store-password
properties.description: Password used to access the key store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-store-provider
properties.description: Provider for the key store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.key-store-type
properties.description: Type of the key store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.protocol
properties.description: SSL protocol to use.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.server-name-bundles
properties.description: Mapping of host names to SSL bundles for SNI configuration.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-certificate
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded SSL certificate authority file.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-certificate-private-key
properties.description: Path to a PEM-encoded private key file for the SSL certificate authority.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-store
properties.description: Trust store that holds SSL certificates.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-store-password
properties.description: Password used to access the trust store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-store-provider
properties.description: Provider for the trust store.

properties.name: spring.rsocket.server.ssl.trust-store-type
properties.description: Type of the trust store.
